name: SpaceMan
0:
”Alexa, ask Space Man what's in space”
”Alexa, ask Space Man what's up for tomorrow”
”Alexa, ask Space Man what's happening tomorrow through Friday”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space man
des:
Spaceman provides space enthusiasts information about phase of the moon; scheduled rocket launches anywhere in the world, both past and future; and asteroids and other objects passing close to the Earth, for dates you request.

Spaceman will give you:
The phase of the moon.
A list of rocket launches, including the time launch time, status, location, and mission name.
A count of how many objects are passing by, including how many NASA has designated as dangerous, and for the closest one, the speed, size, and how close it will get to us.

Ask about what's happening on a single day:
"what's up?"
"what happened yesterday?"
"what's happening tomorrow?"

Ask about a date range, future or past:
"what's happening between today and Friday?"
"what's the news from January 1 2017 to January 5 2017?"

Get more information about Spaceman itself:
"help"
"release notes"
"who built you?"

More information available, or make suggestions, at https://sites.google.com/view/spacemanforalexa/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
